title: Bills score 16 unanswered late to shock Ravens
content: Josh Allen led Buffalo on three scoring drives in the final four minutes, the last a 32-yard field goal by Matt Prater as time expired, and the Bills rallied from 15 points down to stun the Baltimore Ravens 41-40 in a season-opening Sunday night thriller.

title: Jackson shoves fan in retaliation in Ravens' loss
content: During Sunday night's 41-40 loss to the Buffalo Bills in the season opener, Baltimore Ravens quarterback Lamar Jackson shoved a fan who slapped Jackson on the helmet. "I just let my emotions get the best of me," Jackson later told reporters.

title: Parsons gets sack, brings heat in Packers debut
content: Less than two weeks after being traded to Green Bay, Micah Parson got his first sack and was second on the team with three pressures during Sunday's win versus Detroit.

title: Steelers' Rodgers shows Jets he still has it in win
content: Aaron Rodgers threw four touchdown passes Sunday to help the Steelers win their opener and show the Jets that he 'still can' play.

title: Daboll noncommittal on Giants QB for Week 2
content: Giants coach Brian Daboll was hardly definitive on his QB situation entering Week 2 following Sunday's loss to the Commanders, one that saw Russell Wilson struggle throughout.

title: Alcaraz bests Sinner to win US Open, sixth Slam
content: Carlos Alcaraz reasserted his superiority over Jannik Sinner with a 6-2, 3-6, 6-1, 6-4 win Sunday in the US Open final -- the third Grand Slam tournament in a row in which these rivals met to decide a champion -- for his second title at Flushing Meadows.

title: Wilson scores 30 again as Aces' win streak hits 14
content: A'ja Wilson set a league record with her 13th game of at least 30 points, helping the Aces win their 14th game in a row Sunday over the Sky.

title: UCLA suspends backup QB Clarkson after arrest
content: UCLA backup quarterback Pierce Clarkson was arrested on an unspecified felony charge Friday and has been indefinitely suspended from the team.

title: Answering the biggest questions of Week 1: What's more jarring, the Bills' comeback or Baltimore's collapse?
content: NFL Nation reporters react to all the action, answering the biggest questions coming out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 1.

title: Let's overreact to NFL Week 1: Which QB situations are most messy?
content: Will Jaxson Dart take Russell Wilson's job soon? Are the Dolphins doomed? We sized up Week 1 overreactions.

title: As Carlos Alcaraz wins another US Open title, can anyone challenge these Big Two?
content: With the past eight major titles, Alcaraz and Sinner are clearly dominant. Can anyone compete with them?

title: Which WNBA teams have clinched a spot in the 2025 playoffs?
content: Minnesota, Las Vegas, Atlanta, Phoenix, New York, Golden State and Indiana have clinched spots in the 2025 WNBA playoffs.

title: True or false? What we think we know about SEC QBs, the Big 12, Oregon and more
content: The start of the 2025 season has been a delightful mess. Bill Connelly tries to make sense of what we've seen.

title: Ranking Week 1 fantasy football winners and losers and injury impacts from Sunday
content: A summary of Week 1's best and worst fantasy performances, biggest storylines and historical perspective.

title: U.S. loss to South Korea another misstep with World Cup prep time running out
content: You can say this for the USMNT: They're singing from the same songbook of positivity, even as they looked far from being on the same page on the field.

title: From Starkville to Gainesville, Week 2 offered its share of surprises
content: Florida and Mississippi State both produced stunning results on an otherwise relatively predictable Saturday.

title: Denny Hamlin wins at Gateway to advance in playoffs
content: Denny Hamlin won from the pole position at World Wide Technology Raceway, playing the strategy perfectly to lead the final 25 laps in his series-high fifth victory this season.

title: McLaren walking a 'fairness' tightrope with Norris, Piastri
content: Sunday showed where the limitations are in McLaren's handling of the Lando Norris-Oscar Piastri rivalry.

title: Cleveland Browns fans know how to keep the faith
content: The Dawg Pound has witnessed 30 years of futility. Will the team's bid for the burbs test the loyal fanbase?

title: NFL draft risers, questions and notes from Kiper, Miller and Reid: Early concerns around top QBs?
content: John Mateer rising? Questions around LaNorris Sellers and Cade Klubnik? We have updates on NFL draft prospects through CFB Week 2.

title: Betting buzz: Sunday under-whelming for sportsbooks, bettors
content: The Jets-Steelers game was the exception in the NFL on Sunday when almost every game went under the point total.

title: After a cruelly disappointing year, Aryna Sabalenka proves why she's No. 1
content: Top-ranked Sabalenka lost twice in a major final earlier in the year. But at the US Open, she finally won another Grand Slam title.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City to rival Liverpool for Guéhi in January
content: Manchester City could go up against Liverpool for Crystal Palace defender Marc Guéhi in January. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: 10 of the top women's transfers: Yohannes, Thompson, Clinton, more
content: The women's summer transfer window broke records and had some incredible moves. What were some of the best?

title: Nitish Katara murder case: Supreme Court refuses to extend interim bail of convict Vikas Yadav
content: A bench comprising Justices M M Sundresh and Satish Chandra Sharma asked Yadav's counsel to move the Delhi High Court for extension or grant of fresh interim bail in the case

title: Madras High Court stays order directing Junior Vikatan top brass to pay ₹25 lakh compensation to DMK MP T.R. Baalu in defamation suit
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and C. Saravanan grant the interim stay following an appeal filed against the single judge’s February 4, 2025 order

title: Voter fraud allegations in Maharashtra: Had no role to play in approving content of bulk SMS messages, says TRAI
content: TRAI was responding to the Indian National Congress’ allegation that it was stopped from sending a link to a video on allegations of voter fraud in Maharashtra

title: Bengaluru boy hits head on overhead barrier while standing through car sunroof
content: Since the car was moving slowly, the boy, who was traveling with his family, had a narrow escape with no fatal injuries.

title: Tribal outfit claims rats bit 4 fingers of newborn girl, accuses Indore hospital of ‘cover-up’
content: Tribal group demands action after newborns die from rat bites in hospital; officials face culpable homicide charges

title: Brain-eating amoeba: Kerala reports fifth amoebic meningoencephalitis death in a month
content: Deceased is a Wayanad native. Presently, 11 persons are undergoing treatment for the disease at Kozhikode Medical College Hospital

title: Supreme Court asks UPSC, T.N. to consider names for regular DGP ‘expeditiously’
content: A Bench headed by Chief Justice of India B.R. Gavai directed the UPSC and the State to consider the names and make the appointment of regular DGP expeditiously

title: Madras High Court restrains Ajith Kumar-starrer ‘Good Bad Ugly’ producer from exhibiting movie with Ilaiyaraaja’s songs
content: Justice N. Senthilkumar grants the ex-parte interim injunction after stating that Mythri Movie Makers had given a “bald” reply to the composer’s legal notice

title: Kerala State Beverages Corporation registers record ₹970.74 crore in liquor sales during Onam
content: Kerala State Beverages Corporation records a growth of 9.34% in sales revenue compared to the previous year's sales during the Onam season, which was ₹842.07 crore

title: Landslip blocks rail route in Haridwar, movement of trains affected
content: Movement of trains on the route, including the Vande Bharat Express, has been suspended for the time being as the debris clearance is likely to take 8-10 hours

title: Enforce GR; start giving Kunbi certificates to Marathas before September 17: Manoj Jarange to Maharashtra Government
content: The Kunbi is a traditional farming community in the State and they have been included in the list of OBC category in Maharashtra

title: Prohibitory orders imposed in Maddur town in Mandya following stone-pelting during Ganesha procession
content: As the Ganesha procession was passing through a mosque in Ram Rahim Nagar in Maddur, stones were reportedly pelted on the persons dancing in the procession, sparking a retaliation.

title: Senior journalist Sankarshan Thakur passes away
content: Known for his incisive political analysis and ground reporting, Sankarshan Thakur was considered one of the finest writers in contemporary journalism

title: Vaiko expels Mallai Sathya from MDMK
content: MDMK had already suspended Mallai Sathya, and he has now been removed from the organisation. He had differences with Vaiko’s son Durai Vaiko

title: Jammu and Kashmir Congress leader Dina Nath Bhagat dies
content: Bhagat won the Chenani Assembly seat on a BJP ticket in the 2014 Jammu and Kashmir elections. He resigned from the party in November 2020, accusing it of being "anti-Dalit"

title: Hazarika one of the most extraordinary voices India has ever known: PM Modi
content: “Hazarika travelled the globe, rubbed shoulders with the who’s who across all spectrums of society and he always carried the spirit of Assam’s indigenous identity and the ethos of its people everywhere”

title: ED conducts raids in several areas of West Bengal over sand smuggling racket
content: Raids are being carried out in several areas, including Behala, Regent Park, Bidhannagar, and Kalyani, in connection with the scam

title: Tamil Nadu second biggest market for small business credit: study
content: As of June 30, 2025, Tamil Nadu had an outstanding small business credit portfolio of about ₹4.21 lakh crore, up 15.7% from ₹3.64 lakh crore as of June 30 2024, the report said.

title: Who is Anjana Krishna IPS, the Kerala-born officer who stood firm against Ajit Pawar during Solapur anti-mining crackdown
content: The 2022-batch IPS officer, presently Sub-Division Police Officer, Karmala in Solapur district of Maharashtra, grew up in a modest household in Thiruvananthapuram

title: 33 MoUs to bring in ₹15,516 crore investment signed during Germany, U.K. visit: T.N. Chief Minister Stalin
content: The Chief Minister is also scheduled to unveil the foundation for several other projects to be implemented at a cost of ₹1,100 crore

title: Bihar SIR hearing LIVE: Supreme Court to continue hearing pleas against EC’s SIR exercise in Bihar
content: On September 1, the SC was told by ECI that claims, objections and corrections in the draft electoral roll prepared in Bihar under the SIR exercise can be filed beyond September 1 but these would be considered once the electoral roll is finalised

title: One terrorist killed in encounter in J&K’s Kulgam
content: Security forces said that search operation turned into an encounter after the terrorists opened firing at the security forces' positions

title: Pakistani intruder arrested along International Border in Jammu
content: The troops fired a few rounds after challenging the intruder, who was subsequently arrested near the border fence. Some Pakistani currency notes were recovered from him, officials said

title: India, EU working on series of transformative initiatives besides eyeing to seal FTA by December
content: European Commission's agriculture commissioner Christophe Hansen and trade chief Maros Sefcovic are visiting India this week to hold talks with their Indian interlocutors as both sides look to seal the free trade agreement (FTA) by end of this year

title: The Hindu scribe receives award for best reporter
content: The Hindu also received special mention for comprehensive coverage, while K. Ragesh received special mention for best photography at the water fest

title: Gang held for stealing diesel from trucks, police vehicles in Vellore
content: Apart from fuel, spare parts including batteries and spare wheels in vehicles were also being stolen.

title: Umar Khalid verdict raises questions about judicial discretion overruling bail even after long incarceration
content: Bail could be granted if a case was made out for the grant of bail and stringent conditions in the statute were satisfied

title: Nursing dreams held hostage
content: Despite court orders and official bans, private nursing colleges continue to trap students by withholding certificates and enforcing service bonds; PIL seeks regular inspections, grievance redressal mechanism

title: Walking a thin saffron line
content: RSS is a century old, and its chief Mohan Bhagwat wants to give it a makeover. But he is not sure how much, and how

title: 'Adequate food, attached toilet': How India plans to keep Choksi in Mumbai jail; all you need to know
content: The Indian government has assured Belgian authorities of humane detention conditions for Mehul Choksi if he's extradited to India for the PNB fraud case. These assurances, detailing facility specifications and healthcare provisions at Mumbai's Arthur Road Jail, aim to meet international human rights standards.

title: Trump tariff impact: How much will India’s GDP growth be hit? What CEA said
content: Chief Economic Adviser V. Anantha Nageswaran estimates that US President Trump's 50% tariffs could reduce India's GDP growth by 0.5% to 0.6%. While the US tariffs impact export competitiveness, India's growth relies more on domestic consumption. Experts suggest the tariff impact could be limited.

title: 'Entered via donkey route': Haryana man killed in US for objecting to public urination
content: Kapil, a 26-year-old Indian security guard from Haryana, was fatally shot in California after confronting a man for public urination. He had traveled to the US via the "donkey route" two and a half years ago. The village is in mourning and supporting the family, who are seeking government assistance to bring his body back to India.

title: 'Losses must be felt': Zelenskyy backs Trump tariffs on nations supporting Russia; message for India?
content: Amidst the ongoing conflict, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has endorsed the US tariffs on nations supporting Russia through trade, emphasizing that strong actions, including sanctions and trade restrictions, are crucial. He accused Putin of avoiding negotiations, attributing Russia's economic troubles to this refusal. Zelenskyy also highlighted a recent major attack on Kyiv.

title: Accenture CEO’s career lesson: Recalls former CEO’s words, admits ‘I just fell for it’
content: Julie Sweet, now Accenture's CEO, transitioned from a successful legal career after a pivotal conversation with former CEO Bill Green. His vision of her as a business leader, not just a lawyer, resonated deeply. This led her to join Accenture, where she quickly rose through the ranks, driven by a desire to make a significant impact.

title: US scraps third-country visas: Indian students to face backlogs; tougher interviews
content: Indian students now face tougher U.S. visa rules, including the end of third-country applications and mandatory interviews, causing longer waits and uncertainty. Proposed fixed-term visas and stricter compliance requirements add to the challenges. These changes increase costs and risks for Indian families investing in U.S. education, potentially delaying academic pursuits.

title: Mandya clash: Stone pelting mars Ganpati procession in K'taka - what we know so far
content: Tensions flared in Maddur, Mandya district, after stone-pelting incidents disrupted a Lord Ganesh idol immersion procession, leading to clashes between communities. Police responded with a lathi charge to disperse protesters and imposed Section 144 to control the unrest. Several arrests have been made, and additional forces have been deployed to maintain peace and prevent further escalation in the sensitive areas.

title: 'Put down your weapons or ... ': Israel issues 'final' ultimatum to Hamas
content: Israeli Defence Minister Israel Katz issued a stark ultimatum to Hamas, demanding the release of hostages and disarmament, or face the complete destruction of Gaza and their own annihilation. Katz emphasized the IDF's ongoing operations and preparations for expanded maneuvers to decisively defeat Hamas.

title: Trump aide’s 'anti-India' comments fact-checked; Musk responds, says people decide
content: Elon Musk defended Twitter's Community Notes after Peter Navarro criticized the platform for fact-checking his claims about India's Russian oil purchases. Navarro accused India of profiteering and supporting Russia's war, while Twitter's Community Notes clarified that India's purchases are for energy security and don't violate sanctions.

title: 'Will have to refund': US secy explains what will happen if SC rules against tariffs
content: US treasury secretary Scott Bessent stated the department might need to refund roughly half of collected tariffs if the Supreme Court finds Donald Trump's tariffs exceeded presidential authority. A federal appeals court already ruled the tariffs exceeded authority, casting doubt on trade talks. The administration appealed to the Supreme Court, cautioning that eliminating tariffs could weaken the nation.

title: Terror network under scanner: NIA raids 22 locations; searches across five states
content: The National Investigation Agency (NIA) conducted extensive raids across 22 locations in five states and Jammu and Kashmir on Monday, targeting a terror conspiracy case. These coordinated searches, spanning Bihar, Karnataka, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh, and J&K, aimed to uncover evidence related to terror financing, recruitment, and cross-border coordination.

title: Historic chess victory! How Divya Deshmukh beat Africa's Bassem Amin at FIDE Grand Swiss
content: Teen chess prodigy GM Divya Deshmukh, after a shaky start at the Grand Swiss, stunned Africa's top-rated GM Bassem Amin. Playing with black, Divya showcased resilience in the Sicilian Defence, capitalising on Amin's aggressive play. Despite a challenging opening, she seized the initiative, converting a rook sacrifice into a decisive advantage.

title: iPhone 17 series launch tomorrow: Design change on Pro models; these features expected
content: Apple is considering reverting to an aluminum frame for the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max, departing from the titanium design introduced with the iPhone 15 Pro. This change aims to reduce weight and improve heat dissipation, enhancing user comfort and performance stability.

title: ‘Insult to Manipur people’: Congress slams PM Modi over rushed '3-hour visit' to state
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh has criticised Prime Minister Narendra Modi's planned visit to Manipur on September 13, calling it an insult to the state's residents who have been awaiting his attention for nearly 29 months. Ramesh highlighted the brevity of the visit, lasting only three hours, questioning its purpose and impact.

title: Watch: Another Indian woman caught red-handed while shoplifting at Target store
content: A bodycam video surfaced showing an Indian woman, identified as Gujarati, being interrogated by police at a Target store for shoplifting. ​In the process of the interrogation, it was revealed that she was a serial shoplifter from that particular Target store, but that was the first time she was stopped. She admitted that she was going to resell some of the items she stole from the Target store.

title: 'Captain Cool' with guns! MS Dhoni–R Madhavan teaser sparks big-screen buzz - Watch
content: MS Dhoni and R. Madhavan have ignited speculation with a teaser video showcasing them in tactical gear, hinting at a potential action project directed by Vasan Bala. Shared by Madhavan, the teaser promises a wild chase, leaving fans guessing about its nature.

title: Faridabad AC blast tragedy: 3 family members die in inferno
content: In Faridabad's Green Field Colony, a devastating air conditioner compressor explosion claimed the lives of three family members: Sachin Kapoor (49), his wife Rinku Kapoor (48), and their daughter Sujjain (13). The early Sunday morning blast trapped the family on the first floor of their rented accommodation, leading to suffocation.

title: Hippo capsizes boat in Ivory Coast river: 11 missing, including children and a baby
content: A passenger boat capsized on the Sassandra River in Ivory Coast after colliding with a hippopotamus, leaving 11 people missing, including women, children, and an infant. The tragic incident occurred in Buyo, prompting ongoing search efforts by local authorities and rescue teams. This event highlights the dangers of human-animal conflict in the region, where hippo populations are declining due to hunting and habitat loss.

title: Taj Mahal braces for Yamuna fury: Floodwaters reach monument’s walls; alert in Agra
content: The Yamuna river's water level in Agra is rising. It has crossed the danger mark. The water has reached the walls of the Taj Mahal. Homes along the riverbank are flooded. This increase follows heavy rainfall in Himachal Pradesh and Uttarakhand. The district administration is monitoring the situation.

title: NFL Game results: All matches, list of winners; know the top scorers & more
content: The 2025 NFL season commenced with thrilling matchups, showcasing intense competition and standout performances. Victories were secured by teams including the Steelers, Cardinals, Raiders, Bengals, Colts, Commanders, Buccaneers, and Jaguars. Key players like Aaron Rodgers, Geno Smith, and Justin Fields delivered exceptional plays, setting high expectations for an action-packed season.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the rate outlook for this week - should you buy or sell?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices have surged to record highs, fueled by geopolitical tensions and expectations of a US Federal Reserve rate cut. Weak US labor market data has solidified these expectations, with markets pricing in a high probability of a rate cut.

title: Why Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce decided to skip the 2025 MTV VMAs?
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce skipped the 2025 MTV VMAs, where Swift was nominated for Artist of the Year. Swift, enjoying personal time post-Eras Tour, revealed on Kelce's podcast her rediscovered hobbies like baking and painting. Kelce, the Kansas City Chiefs' tight end, was occupied with the NFL season, including a game in Brazil.

title: Bihar floods: Villagers give piggyback ride to 'unwell' Congress MP; watch video
content: During an inspection of flood-affected regions in Bihar, a video surfaced showing villagers carrying Katihar MP Tariq Anwar on their shoulders. The Congress leader, who was on a two-day visit to his constituency, toured waterlogged areas as part of his assessment. Local officials stated that Anwar's ill health prevented him from walking through the flooded areas.

title: MS Dhoni takes vintage Rolls-Royce for a spin in Ranchi: Fans go crazy; visuals go viral
content: MS Dhoni's vintage Rolls-Royce drew fan frenzy in Ranchi, showcasing his enduring popularity. Dewald Brevis, who played for CSK in IPL 2025, was deeply impressed by Dhoni's humility and accessibility off the field. Brevis highlighted Dhoni's open-door policy and willingness to connect with players, even amidst his personal time, emphasizing the CSK environment.

title: 5 teens ‘sodomise’, kill 12-year-old Odisha madrassa student
content: In Nayagarh, police have apprehended five juveniles for the alleged sexual abuse and murder of a 12-year-old madrassa student. The investigation revealed a prior attempt on the boy's life in August. The accused, aged 13-15, reportedly strangled the victim after he threatened to expose their actions, disposing of his body in a septic tank.

title: Rs 1.5 crore gold kalash stolen near Red Fort: Delhi police arrest suspect in Hapur
content: Delhi Crime Branch apprehended a man in Hapur for allegedly stealing two golden kalash, valued at approximately Rs 1.5 crore, from a religious event near the Red Fort. The theft, involving a one-kilogram gold kalash, was reported on Wednesday, prompting an investigation based on CCTV footage. An FIR has been registered under Section 303 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita.

title: Ukrainian stabbed in US subway: Trump asked for reaction; watch video
content: Donald Trump expressed his horror upon learning about the stabbing of Iryna Zarutska, a Ukrainian woman who sought refuge in America. The incident occurred on a Charlotte subway in August, with a disturbing video now circulating online. Trump pledged to investigate the matter thoroughly and provide a response by the following morning.

title: IMT Manesar murder: Ugandan woman's body found on Delhi-Jaipur highway
content: In Gurgaon, a Ugandan woman's body was discovered near IMT Manesar Chowk on Sunday morning, prompting the detention of two suspects. Police suspect the woman, believed to be in her 30s, was sexually assaulted before being murdered, as indicated by the crime scene examination.

title: Dabangg director says Salman Khan is 'gunda', calls Khan family 'vindictive'
content: Abhinav Kashyap, director of Dabangg, criticizes Salman Khan's behavior on set. He calls Salman a 'gunda' and questions his acting commitment. Abhinav claims the Khan family wields significant industry power. He alleges they make life difficult for those who disagree with them. Anurag Kashyap, Abhinav's brother, faced similar issues during Tere Naam. Anurag eventually left the project due to mistreatment.

title: Just DU it! How research push helped 5 colleges dominate NIRF 2025 rankings
content: Delhi University's colleges have excelled in the latest NIRF rankings, driven by a strategic emphasis on research excellence aligned with the National Education Policy. Hindu, Miranda House, Hansraj, Kirori Mal, and St Stephen's secured the top five positions, reflecting their commitment to fostering academic growth, innovation, and holistic student development through research initiatives, infrastructure improvements, and robust student support systems.

title: Asia Cup: ‘Kuldeep Yadav at his peak now,’ says Ravi Shastri
content: Ravi Shastri advocates for wrist-spinners Varun Chakravarthy and Kuldeep Yadav in India's Asia Cup XI, emphasizing Kuldeep's peak form. He believes Surya Kumar Yadav is a capable T20 captain, leading a fearless and talented team. Shastri acknowledges Jasprit Bumrah's brilliance but cautions against complacency, highlighting the need for spinners to perform well.

title: Bihar polls: Two more parties join Mahagathbandhan; seat-sharing deal to get complex?
content: Bihar's upcoming assembly elections witness complex seat-sharing negotiations within the Mahagathbandhan alliance as JMM and LJP (Paras) join. Congress insists on 70 seats, while VIP demands 60 plus Deputy CM post. CPI-ML seeks 40 seats, and RJD wants no less than 150. Tejashwi Yadav, declared CM face, criticizes the Nitish Kumar government for allegedly copying his ideas during a rally.

title: Boy pops out of moving car in Bengaluru; hits overhead barrier
content: A six-year-old boy was injured after popping out of a moving car's sunroof and hitting an overhead barrier in Bengaluru. The incident, which occurred in Vidyaranyapura, sparked outrage on social media, with users condemning the dangerous behavior. Police have registered a case against the boy's brother-in-law for rash and negligent driving under section 281 of BNS.

title: A few clouds in the SKY? With Gill’s elevation, heat is on Surya to regain his aura
content: Suryakumar Yadav's T20 captaincy is under scrutiny as selectors prioritize individual performance alongside leadership. Despite a high winning percentage, his batting form dipped, raising concerns about his place in the team.

title: Why Ravens QB Lamar Jackson wears diamond grillz? Inside story of his roots & stardom
content: Lamar Jackson, Baltimore Ravens quarterback, sports diamond grillz. These grillz reflect his Florida roots and NFL success. He calls his look a '10 on 12'. The custom grillz cost a five-figure amount. For Jackson, they symbolize growth and honoring his past. His smile shines as a statement piece. It captures attention like his game-day heroics.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 24,800; BSE Sensex up almost 200 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Monday. While Nifty50 was above 24,800, BSE Sensex was up almost 200 points.

title: Malayalam actor fined Rs 1.14 lakh for carrying jasmine flowers at Melbourne airport
content: Navya Nair faced a substantial fine at Melbourne International Airport for carrying jasmine flowers during her visit for Onam celebrations. Despite being unaware of the regulations, she was penalized 1,980 Australian dollars, equivalent to approximately Rs 1.14 lakh, for possessing a 15-centimetre jasmine garland. The actress later shared her experience, humorously acknowledging the costly mistake.

title: Kolkata birthday party horror: Student 'drugged, gang-raped, held captive overnight'
content: A 20-year-old college student in Kolkata was allegedly drugged and gang-raped by two friends, Chandan Malik and Debangsu Biswas, during a birthday party. The incident occurred at Biswas's rented home in Tollygunge, where she was held captive overnight after her drink was spiked.

title: 'Putin testing the world': Zelenskyy calls for Russia sanctions after attack on Ukraine
content: Following Russia's largest aerial assault since the war's start, striking government buildings and residential areas, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy urged tougher sanctions on Moscow. He emphasized that international condemnation must translate into concrete actions like sanctions and trade restrictions.

title: First phase of teachers recruitment in exam in West Bengal held without any glitches
content: The total number of outstation candidates who appeared in the examination was more than 31,000. Another 2.46 lakh candidates will sit for the recruitment test of assistant teachers of classes XI and XII at 478 centres on September 14

title: Redevelopment of Ernakulam Town station to be completed by September next year
content: Work completed on the vacant space near the station, while the old station building, which is to be replaced with a new structure as part of the project, is yet to be handed over to the contracting firm

title: Over 2.68L Ganesh idols immersed in 40-hour yatra across Hyderabad
content: Police register five cases of minor disputes, arrest 170 people for misbehaving with women and detained several others for picking pockets

title: Army Southern Command chief meets CM Revanth Reddy
content: The discussion was centered on issues concerning military-civil fusion, internal security, veteran welfare, disaster response and development initiatives

title: Mavelicuz ’25 concludes with grand musical evening in Kozhikode
content: The week-long festival brought together celebrity artistes from around the world, showcasing unique art forms.

title: Sri Lankan Tamils not eligible for long-term visas
content: Although last week’s Home Ministry order removes the tag of an ‘illegal migrant’ from registered Sri Lankan Tamil nationals who entered India before January 9, 2015, it will not immediately help in grant of Indian citizenship

title: Congress MLA may ask Supreme Court to direct ECI to share data on poll fraud in his constituency with Karnataka CID
content: CID probing forged forms filed to delete voter names in Karnataka’s Aland constituency in 2023; ECI has not responded to requests for technical data; Congress chief says ECI is stonewalling to shield culprits

title: Veerashaiva Mahasabha urges Veerashaiva-Lingayats to enumerate themselves under ‘others’ in religion column
content: The Akhila Bharatha Veerashaiva Mahasabha on Sunday appealed to the Veerashaiva-Lingayats to enumerate themselves as ‘others’ instead of Hindu in the religion column during the socio-educational survey commencing on September 22

title: We demand accountability, answers and justice from Election Commission, says Karnataka Chief Minister
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, referring to The Hindu story on alleged voter fraud in Aland ahead of the Assembly polls in 2023 published on Sunday, said they demand ‘accountability, answers and justice’ from Election Commission of India

title: Bhupinder Hooda slams BJP govt. in Haryana over portal for flood-hit farmers to seek compensation
content: The Congress leader, on a visit to affected areas, demands immediate compensation even as Chief Minister Naib Singh Saini says the portal had been opened and the farmers would get the compensation soon.

title: Amidst tensions, India-Bangladesh Joint River Commission to meet on September 9
content: Bangladesh expected to ask for a special vehicle to manage the waters of 14 cross-border rivers, sources say; also seeks joint flood forecasting mechanism; Ganga treaty comes up for renewal next year

title: New documentary on late Bhupen Hazarika premiered
content: The documentary titled Bhupen da Uncut premieres ahead of birth centenary celebrations, featuring vintage footage and “unpublished” poems

title: ‘Vijayawada Utsav’ to be held from September 22
content: Hope the festival will attract investments, create jobs and will help Vijayawada transform into a major business hub, says MP Kesineni Sivanath

title: Dream of temple in Mathura will be fulfilled: BJP
content: The dream of the Ram Temple has been fulfilled, now it is the turn of Mathura-Vrindavan, says BJP on X

title:
Private beach resort penalised for excavating natural sand on seafront at 
Mamallapuram
content:
The Tamil Nadu State Coastal Zone Management Authority has decided to impose an ‘environment compensation’ of ₹2.60 
lakh on the resort on the East Coast Road after it was found to have excavated natural sand in the seafront area at Mamallapuram two years ago

title: Tourism Minister refutes YSRCP claims on medical college privatisation
content: Kandula Durgesh explains benefits of PPP model, says it will speed up construction, add MBBS seats, and keep colleges under government control; outlines phased expansion plans across the State

title: NC, PDP condemn ‘detention of locals’ over Hazratbal incident
content: BJP says ‘vandalism unacceptable’; the issue was being ‘institutionally distorted to represent a twisted litmus test for nationalism’, NC leader and MP Aga Syed Ruhullah said

title: MSMEs ‘key to self-reliant India’, it’s an ‘opportune time’ to engage in defence sector: DRDO chief
content: Dr. Samir V. Kamat was speaking at a conclave organised by the Defence Technology and Test Centre (DTTC), Lucknow, at its Amausi campus to promote collaboration with industry for the Uttar Pradesh Defence Industrial Corridor.

title: NDA, INDIA blocs to train MPs on voting procedure for Vice-President election
content: The BJP begins two-day workshop on Sunday, with PM Modi sitting at the venue for the entire day. The INDIA bloc will hold a mock polling session for its MPs on Monday. Both blocs cancel plan to host MPs for dinner, considering the flood situation in many States

title: India cautions against misuse of export measures at SCO trade Ministers’ meet
content: At the SCO Trade Ministers' Meeting in Vladivostok, Russia on September 6, India said that calibrated and transparent use of these steps is essential to maintain trust in international commerce

title: CPI(M) accuses KPCC digital cell of throwing a lifeline to the BJP by correlating ‘Beedis and Biharis’
content: The comment threatens to retard the political momentum gained by the INDIA bloc’s 16-day Voter Adhikari Yatra, led by Rahul Gandhi and Tejashwi Yadav, against ‘voter list fraud’ ahead of the Bihar polls, says Rajesh

title: Conversations over judges’ appointment, 130th Constitutional amendment dominate SRM law symposium
content: ‘A 31-day arrest amounts to letting a constable nullify the essence of electoral democracy,’ senior advocate Abhishek Manu Singhvi said on the Bill seeking the removal of MPs or MLAs if they were imprisoned for 30 days

title: NHRC notice to Madhya Pradesh officials over death of infants after rat bites at Indore hospital
content: “Such a lapse not only breaches the trust of citizens in public healthcare but also constitutes a serious violation of the Right to Life and Health under Article 21 of the Constitution,” says the rights panel

title: Thin vote margins in the past make Opposition wary of SIR in Bihar
content: As per ADR data, in the 2020 Assembly election, the winning margin was under 1% or less than 3,000 votes in 35 seats. It was less than 5,000 votes in 52 seats. RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav had recently said that the results in about 35 seats could be affected in the upcoming election if even just 1% of the voters are removed from the rolls through the SIR.

title: Church dedicated to ‘millennial saint’ Carlo Acutis consecrated at Kakkanad in Kerala
content: The teenage computer aficionado, dubbed ‘God’s influencer’, has been canonised at Vatican, making him the Roman Catholic Church’s first ‘millennial saint’

title: SNDP Yogam accuses UDF of turning its back on Sabarimala development
content: He accuses Satheesan of conducting a “live dress rehearsal” as the next Chief Minister of the State without showing the statesmanship qualities required for the top post

title: GST irony plays out in Onam market as consumers postpone purchase plans
content: Many consumers postpone purchase plans anticipating a price fall once the GST revision comes into effect from September 22. Key traders in the State say they saw a dip in customer footfall during Onam, a season  when sales normally peak

title: NDA will form the government in Bihar once again, says Nitish
content: The Bihar CM asserted that rapid development is taking place in all areas and special attention has been given to education and health sectors

title: Hydrotherapy pool at rehabilitation centre near Tiruchi helps rescued elephants cool off
content: The pool is meant to provide muscle relaxation for aged captive elephants suffering from pain and weakness in their legs. The elephants are led to the pool by their mahouts in the morning, and spend about an hour in the water, says an official

title: US Tightens Visa Rules: No More Quick Appointments Abroad For Indians
content: The US Department of State has issued a directive- effective immediately - requiring non-immigrant visa (NIV) applicants, including Indians, to set up their interview appointments exclusively in their country of citizenship or legal residence.

title: South Korea Feels 'Betrayed' By US Immigration Raid At Hyundai-LG Factory
content: US immigration authorities targeted the construction site of a Hyundai-LG battery factory in the southern state of Georgia on Thursday, arresting some 475 people including South Korean workers.

title: AAP's 'Phulera' Question To Delhi Chief Minister, BJP's Sunita Kejriwal Reply
content: The BJP has hit back at the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) for targeting Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta over her husband attending government meetings

title: Jaipur Restaurant Staff, Customers Hit Each Other During Fight Over Booking
content: Ugly scenes were displayed at a restaurant in Jaipur when its staff and a group of customers, including two women, engaged in a fight over a seat reservation.

title: Tesla Offers $1 Trillion Pay Package For Boss Elon Musk, Here's Why
content: Tesla's board of directors has proposed a new pay package to the tune of $1 trillion for CEO Elon Musk, subject to the company hitting its ambitious future goals.

title: "Learn From PM Modi...": Israeli Expert's India Lesson On Gaza War
content: Israel should learn how to make "national honour" a "strategic asset" from India, according to Israeli defence policy expert Zaki Shalom.

title: Amid Rift In AIADMK, K Sengottaiyan Heads To Haridwar For "Peace Of Mind"
content: In the midst of rising tensions within the AIADMK, senior leader and nine-time MLA K Sengottaiyan on Thursday left for Delhi, clarifying that his trip was purely for personal reasons.

title: All About OpenAI's New AI-First Jobs Platform That Will Challenge LinkedIn
content: OpenAI is developing a newAI-powered jobs platform to connect individuals with AI skills to companies and organisations that need them.

title: Who Is Decarlos Brown Jr, Man Accused of Killing Ukrainian Refugee On Train
content: Decarlos Brown Jr, 34, has been arrested on charges of murdering a 23-year-old Ukrainian refugee on train.

title: "Heartbeat Of People": PM's Tribute To Bhupen Hazarika On Birth Anniversary
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday paid rich tributes to renowned Assamese artist Bhupen Hazarika on his birth anniversary, describing him as "one of the most extraordinary voices" of India.

title: Who Is Japan's Prince Hisahito, 1st Male Heir To Reach Adulthood In 40 Years
content: Prince Hisahito, the nephew of Emperor Naruhito, has reached adulthood, a first in 40 years for a male member of Japan's imperial family.

title: Namotsav Mega Musical Showcases PM Modi's Life Journey In Surat
content: The atmosphere was electric at the Sarsana Convention Center in Surat, as audiences watched the grand musical multimedia stage production 'Namotsav', based on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's life.

title: Rats Bite Newborn Girl's Fingers In Indore Hospital, Sparks Outrage
content: Days after a newborn girl died at the government-run Maharaja Yeshwantrao Hospital (MYH) here, a tribal outfit on Monday claimed rats had gnawed her four fingers, and accused the medical facility's administration of lying and misleading everyone.

title: Putin, Xi Jinping To Take Part In Virtual BRICS Trade Summit, PM Modi To Skip
content: China has confirmed that President Xi Jinping will take part in a virtual BRICS summit convened by Brazil to discuss Donald Trump's trade policy.

title: No Solitary Confinement, Here's How Mehul Choksi Will Live In Mumbai Jail
content: For fugitive diamantaire Mehul Choksi's extradition, India gives assurance to Belgium on his detention conditions

title: Over 100 Mobiles, Several Gold Chains Stolen During Lalbaugcha Raja Immersion
content: The immersion procession of Mumbai's most celebrated Ganesh idol, Lalbaugcha Raja, was marred by a spate of thefts as miscreants took advantage of the massive crowds.

title: Indian Woman Questioned By US Cops For Stealing From Target, Video Viral
content: The video, dated January 15, shows the woman sobbing and gasping for breath while officers tried to question her.

title: Surrender Or Be Annihilated: Israel's "Final Warning" To Hamas
content: Israeli Defence Minister Israel Katz warned Hamas on Monday to lay down its arms or face the destruction of Gaza and its own annihilation.

title: 'Trump Whisperer' Ex-Minister Toshimitsu Motegi Joins Japan PM Race
content: Former foreign minister Toshimitsu Motegi is angling to lead the world's fourth-largest economy as it faces fresh turbulence stemming from rising food prices and fallout from US tariffs on its crucial auto sector.

title: News: Sliding Dodgers deal with injuries
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the last game on the slate getting underway at 4:10 p.m. in the desert between the Arizona Diamondbacks and Boston Red Sox .

title: Best of NFL Week 1 tunnel fits, featuring Travis Hunter's new haircut
content: the pregame tunnel doubles as a runway for the NFL's brightest stars to make an entrance long before the first snap . veterans and rookies alike have arrived in statement looks, some pairing tailored cuts with clean sneakers and crisp knits . some keep it strictly business in classic suits, others lean casual with relaxed looks .

title: 60K club: Matthew Stafford becomes 10th player to throw for 60,000 yards
content: Aaron Rodgers became the ninth quarterback to throw for 60,000 regular-season passing yards . he threw for 245 yards in the win against the Houston Texans . the Rams chose to rest him ahead of their playoff run .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 2
content: Ohio State coach Ryan Day was candid in his postgame assessment of the drubbing of FCS Grambling . day said it was "not a matchup game" that was the theme of week 2, which featured multiple contenders playing FCS opponents or other unranked, lower-level teams .

title: Early-game headlines: Fields-Wilson combo shines
content: the fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . the new york Jets installed a run-focused approach to the team's opening tilt . it's worth noting that Wilson's production came largely against the coverage of Jalen Ramsey .

title: ✈️Steelers' jab at Jets tops Week 1 trolls
content: Steelers QB Aaron Rodgers threw for 244 yards and four touchdowns in 34-32 win . Jets quarterback Justin Fields accounted for 266 yards and three touchdowns . the Steelers also turned off the airplane mode function on an iPhone .

title: AP Week 2 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: four AP-ranked teams outscored their opponents by a combined 307-26 . four ranked teams scored 70 or more points, the second time in the AP poll era . it's the longest streak to begin a game in school history .

title: College football betting: Why Florida State should have your attention
content: the Seminoles beat the Crimson Tide 31-17 in a heavyweight matchup . it was a "program-shifting win," analysts call it a 'statement' for Mike Norvell's culture .
